entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
